doc:
Armando Calvo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armando_Calvo 0 Armando Calvo (25 December 1919 – 6 July 1996) was a Spanish film actor. He was born in San Juan, Puerto Rico to Spanish actor Juan Calvo Domenech and a Puerto Rican mother, Minerva Lespier. He appeared in 90 films between 1939 and 1984. Armando_Calvo ( 25_December_1919 – 6_July_1996 ) was a_Spanish_film_actor . He was_born in San_Juan , Puerto_Rico to Spanish_actor_Juan_Calvo_Domenech and a_Puerto_Rican_mother , Minerva_Lespier . He appeared in 90_films between 1939_and_1984 .
